articles.title: ‘No god is a Brahmin’, says JNU Vice Chancellor, flags ‘gender bias’ in Manusmriti
articles.description: Speaking on the topic “Dr B.R. Ambedkar’s Thought on Gender Justice: Decoding the Uniform Civil Code”, Pandit said, “Anthropologically, scientifically... please look at the origins of our gods. No god is a Brahmin.
